longBusinessSummary: The Supreme Industries Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of plastic products in India. The company offers plastic piping systems, including uPVC pipes, injection moulded PVC and handmade fittings, polypropylene random co-polymer pipe systems, HDPE and CPVC pipe systems, inspection chambers, manholes, bath fittings and sanitaryware, roto moulded tanks and fittings, solvents, industrial piping systems, DWC and PEX Pe pipe systems, and fire sprinkler systems. It also provides industrial products, such as appliance parts and appliances, auto parts and sub-assemblies, and other industrial products; and material handling solutions comprising crates, pallets, garbage and dust bins, silpacks, and other customized material handling products, as well as offers composite LPG cylinders under the KAVACH brand name. In addition, the company provides packaging products comprising flexible packaging film products, protective packaging products, and cross laminated film and products. Further, its furniture products include chairs, tables, beds, cupboards, stools, and kids' furniture. The company also exports its plastic products. The Supreme Industries Limited was incorporated in 1942 and is based in Mumbai, India.
